example.parse: ( (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (VV 说) (PU ，) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (NP (PN 你们)) (DP (DT 这些)) (ADJP (JJ 大)) (NP (NN 小孩))) (VP (VP (VV 让) (NP-OBJ (PN 我)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 笑) (DER 得) (VP-EXT (ADVP (AD 这么)) (VP (VA 厉害))))) (PU ，) (VP (VV 以致) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (PN 我)) (VP (VV 忘) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (DP (DT 所有)) (DP (DT 那些)) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-TPC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-SBJ (PN 我)) (VP (VV 发誓) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VV 吐露) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 一)) (NP (NN 字)))))))) (DEC 的))) (DNP (ADJP (JJ 古老)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 血誓)))))))))))) (PU ．) (PU ．．．．．)))
example.arg: 你们这些大小孩让我笑得这么厉害
